example.description: Returns the policy descriptions of all policies associated with the specified load balancer.
Returns the policy description of the specified policy for the load balancer.
Returns the policy descriptions of the specified policies for the load balancer.

example.code:
PS C:\>Get-ELBLoadBalancerPolicy
PolicyAttributeDescriptions PolicyName PolicyTypeName --------------------------- ---------- -------------- {Protocol-SSLv2, Protocol-TLSv1, Protocol-SSLv3, ... ELBSecurityPolicy-2015-02 SSLNegotiationPolicyType {Protocol-SSLv2, Protocol-TLSv1, Protocol-SSLv3, ... ELBSecurityPolicy-2014-10 SSLNegotiationPolicyType {Protocol-SSLv2, Protocol-TLSv1, Protocol-SSLv3, ... ELBSecurityPolicy-2014-01 SSLNegotiationPolicyType {Protocol-SSLv2, Protocol-TLSv1, Protocol-SSLv3, ... ELBSecurityPolicy-2011-08 SSLNegotiationPolicyType {Protocol-SSLv2, Protocol-TLSv1, Protocol-SSLv3, ... ELBSample-ELBDefaultCipherPolicy SSLNegotiationPolicyType {Protocol-SSLv2, Protocol-TLSv1, Protocol-SSLv3, ... ELBSample-OpenSSLDefaultCipherPolicy SSLNegotiationPolicyType
example.description: Returns the descriptions of all the sample policies. The names of the sample policies have the ELBSample- prefix.
Returns the descriptions of the specified policies. The names of the sample policies have the ELBSample- prefix.
